attributes.action: GP budget holders could be tempted to line their own pockets by referring their patients to the health business for which they have financial interest
attributes.additional_details: GP budget holders could be tempted to line their own pockets by referring their patients to the health business for which they have financial interests or shareholdings; to the detriment of comprehensive well-funded, well equipped, NHS that is staffed with experienced professionals. There need to have checks and balances for even for other NHS professionals. Even frontline healthcare NHS professionals who themselves (not only managers) interview & appoint new healthcare professional colleagues & services may also develop services that duplicate and over-manned healthcare services. Not only do the politicians, Judges, executives, police, media need checks and balances, so do dentists, NHS professionals (like nurses), GP budget holders, etc.
